title: OUDE HOWER Half Round Fireplace Mat, 48'' × 27'' Fire Resistant Mat Hearth Pad, Fiberglass Protect Floor from Sparks Embers Indoor Outdoor
features: 【Fireplace Mat Material】The high-Temperature resistance fireplace mat is made of fiberglass material. Allowing withstand temperature up to 1832 °F, fireproofing and insulating heat. Well protect the wood floor or grass from hot embers It can well protect the floor or grass from hot embers smoke and star fires.

【Non-slip Fireplace Mat】The half round fire retardant hearth area mat is made of non-slip silicone cloth on front and back surfaces, which can fix the carpet on the ground to prevent it from moving around. The fireplace floor protective pad has a waterproof and oil proof coating on its surface to prevent liquid from seeping into the floor through the carpet.

【More Coverage】The size of the fireplace mat is about 48''x27''. Double side available, provide longer service life. Fireproof mat can be easily folded into a small size BAG, which can save storage space. At the same time, the lightweight design makes this fire protector rug suitable for a variety of activities throughout the year.

【Wide Application】Our fiberglass fire resistant fireplace mat can protect floors, carpets, decks, garage floors, patios and other surfaces from spills such as fireplaces, outdoor grills, or damage caused by dripping water around them. or the surrounding dripping water. In addition, it can isolate or even extinguish small fires to protect family members.
【Easy to Clean】You can directly use a vacuum cleaner, a broom, or shaking to clean the fireplace floor protector mat.
description: "PROTECT HEARTH and HOME The Flame Resistant Fireplace Hearth Rug protects hearth and home from the damage of flying sparks, popping embers and potential fire hazards. Our fireproof fireplace mat is made of double-layer glass fiber material, which can withstand temperatures up to 1832 ° F.  Specification: Quantity: 1pcs Color: black Material: fiberglass Size: 27 × 48 inch Note: Although our fire mat is very heat resistant, you need to avoid large pieces of burning coal or logs falling on the fire mat (small sparks and ashes have no effect), prolonged exposure to extreme heat will transfer heat and damage the subfloor. Please pay attention to it if fireplaces without fire screens. "
